thread.title: Netflix drops first full trailer for Mr. Show reboot, W/ Bob and David
thread.title_full: Netflix drops first full trailer for Mr. Show reboot, W/ Bob and David

title: Netflix drops first full trailer for Mr. Show reboot, W/ Bob and David
text:
Netflix drops first full trailer for Mr. Show reboot, W/ Bob and David 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Netflix has released the first trailer for its upcoming "reboot" of popular HBO sketch comedy show Mr. Show with Bob and David, called W/Bob...
